use.flag: Depend on llvm-core/clang as host compiler
Enforce the minimum compatible x11-drivers/nvidia-drivers version, as described in: https://docs.nvidia.com/cuda/cuda-toolkit-release-notes/index.html#cuda-driver
Install profiling and optimizing tools (nsight-compute, nsight-systems)
Install the NVIDIA CUDA profiler (nvprof) and the related libraries
